IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: DHDC SERVES OVER 5,000 PEOPLE A YEAR. PROGRAMS INCLUDE: YOUTH SERVICES; ADULT & FAMILY SERVICES INCLUDING ADULT EDUCATION, HOUSING COUNSELING, PARENTING, TATTOO REMOVAL; AND COMMUNITY ORGANIZING AND ADVOCACY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE DETROIT HISPANIC DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION'S MISSION IS TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE BY CREATING LIFE CHANGING OPPORTUNITIES FOR YOUTH AND THEIR FAMILIES. WE ARE COMMITTED TO MEETING THE NEEDS OF OUR COMMUNITY BY PROVIDING QUALITY, INNOVATIVE AND CULTURALLY APPROPRIATE PROGRAMS AND SERVICES, PRIMARILY IN THE SOUTHWEST DETROIT COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: YOUTH PROGRAMS, INCLUDING STEAM PROGRAMS, ROBOTICS, YOUTH DEVELOPMENT, TRAUMA AND HEALING, SUMMER YOUTH EMPLOYMENT, TUTORING, TRANSPORTATION AND FOOD.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY ORGANIZING AND ADVOCACY AROUND ISSUES SUCH AS IMMIGRATION, EDUCATION, ENVIRONMENTAL JUSTICE, AND EQUITABLE DEVELOPMENT.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: ADULT AND FAMILY SERVICES: PARENTING, HOUSING COUNSELING, ADULT EDUCATION, REENTRY SERVICES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: VARIOUS OTHER PROGRAMS INCLUDING ENTREPENEURIAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE ORGANIZATION'S INCOME TAX FILINGS ARE SUBJECT TO AUDIT BY VARIOUS TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE ORGANIZATION'S OPEN AUDIT PERIODS ARE 2018 - 2021.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
HISPANIC CENTER OF WESTERN MICHIGAN INC
JEWISH FAMILY SERVICES OF WASHTENAW COUNTY INC
LATIN AMERICANS FOR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS REQUIRED TO SUBMIT A PROGRESS REPORT WHICH DETAILS THE PROGRESS TO DATE TOWARD ACHIEVING PROJECT OBJECTIVES & ACTIVITIES. THE PROGRESS REPORT WILL ALSO CONTAIN AN EXPENDITURE REPORT. THE ORGANIZATION IS ALSO REQUIRED TO SUBMIT A FINAL REPORT. IT WILL DETAIL THE STATUS OF OUTCOMES & RESULTS ACHIEVED FOR OBJECTIVES. AN EXPENDITURE REPORT WILL ALSO BE SUBMITTED WITH THE FINAL REPORT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE L, PART IV, BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING INTERESTED PERSONS:

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS FIRST REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THEN SHARED WITH THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, WHICH INCLUDES THE TREASURER AND CHAIRPERSON OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ALL RECEIVE A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND DISCLOSURE FORM ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE IN WRITING ON THE FORM ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS AND ATTEST TO THE ACCURACY OF THE INFORMATION. THEY ALSO DECLARE THAT IF AT ANY TIME THEY BECOME AWARE OF ANY ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST, OR IF THE INFORMATION PROVIDED BECOMES INACCURATE OR INCOMPLETE, THEY WILL PROMPTLY NOTIFY THE DHDC CHAIRPERSON & EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IN WRITING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MICHIGAN NONPROFIT COMPENSATION & BENEFIT REPORT IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY FOR INFORMATION ON COMPENSATION FOR COMPARABLE POSITIONS, SIZE AND TYPE OF ORGANIZATION. SALARY RANGES ARE DEVELOPED FOR EACH POSITION, ACCORDING TO CLASSIFICATION, LEVEL OF RESPONSIBILITY, YEARS OF EXPERIENCE, AND RELEVANT EDUCATION AND TRAINING. THESE SALARY RANGES ARE REVIEWED BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND SUBMITTED FOR FINAL APPROVAL BY VOTE OF THE FULL BOARD. THE CEO'S SALARY RECOMMENDATION IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND SUBMITTED TO THE FULL BOARD FOR APPROVAL. THE EMPLOYEE COMPLETES THEIR PERFORMANCE AND DEVELOPMENT GOALS FOR THE SHORT TERM AND LONG TERM AND IDENTIFIES PRIORITY AREAS. THE PLAN IS THEN SHARED AND DISCUSSED WITH THEIR MANAGER AND REVISED AS NEEDED. THESE ARE REVIEWED AND ADJUSTED QUARTERLY. CHANGES IN POSITION OR RESPONSIBILITIES ALSO WILL RESULT IN A REVIEW AND RECOMMENDATION FOR SALARY ADJUSTMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
